title: Since the latest update, Phone keeps crashing. Charging to 83% only. Will only turn on when plugged
content: I have had this phone since the first month of its release. Since its latest update it is NOT turning on unless it is plugged in. No matter how long it is plugged in it is only charging till "83%." Is there anyone that can help as the phone is unusable otherwise (as it is not turning on)?
